name: Aged, blind, and permanently and totally disabled persons; eligibility for assistance
text: [§346-52]  Aged, blind, and permanently and totally disabled persons; eligibility for assistance.  A person shall be eligible for public assistance who meets the requirements established by the federal supplemental security income program or its successor agency, provided the person is also determined needy in accordance with state standards. [L 1975, c 145, pt of §1(3); gen ch 1985]
